Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{name}},

We're sorry to see you've recently cancelled your HospoSure subscription. If this was a mistake you can resubscribe below, otherwise we are sorry HospoSure no longer meets your needs. We appreciate your business and thank you if you chose to share any feedback with us.

Resubscribe

Access to Your Venues

You will continue to have the same level of access until the end of your subscription period, at which point your subscription will expire and your access will revert to Demo level only.

We Appreciate Your Business

We hope you were able to make the most of HospoSure and gather valuable insights to enhance your understanding of running a successful cafe operation. If you ever need assistance in the future or decide to resume with HospoSure, we're here to support you.

Ongoing Business Mentorship

If you're done modelling your cafe and need ongoing support in other areas of your business, remember we partner with Clever Cafe Company, who can help you with advertising and exposure, integral pillars of business mentorship, and industry networking.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please reach out to us anytime at hello@hosposure.com.au.

Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

Copyright © 2026 HospoSure Pty Ltd.
All rights reserved.
Template.TextPart:
Hi {{name}},

We're sorry to see you've recently cancelled your HospoSure subscription. If this was a mistake you can resubscribe below, otherwise we are sorry HospoSure no longer meets your needs. We appreciate your business and thank you if you chose to share any feedback with us.

Go to app.hosposure.com.au/profile to resubscribe.

Access to Your Venues
You will continue to have the same level of access until the end of your subscription period, at which point your subscription will expire and your access will revert to Demo level only.

We Appreciate Your Business
We hope you were able to make the most of HospoSure and gather valuable insights to enhance your understanding of running a successful cafe operation. If you ever need assistance in the future or decide to resume with HospoSure, we're here to support you.

Ongoing Business Mentorship
If you're done modelling your cafe and need ongoing support in other areas of your business, remember we partner with Clever Cafe Company CleverCafeCompany.com.au who can help you with advertising and exposure, integral pillars of business mentorship, and industry networking.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please reach out to us anytime at hello@hosposure.com.au.

HospoSure | Your cafe with confidence
